title: ENVIRONMENTAL HEALTH SCIENCE
de_requirements: This shall be for a period of 4 years. Requirements include 2 A level credits plus GCE O level results, and National Diploma (ND) (Upper Credit) in Environmental Health Sciences, Holders of HND or BSc from a health related field, holders of 3 year EH technician certificate/ Registered Nurses, NCE (Physical/Health education with about 3 years’ experience may also be admitted, in addition to other basic minimum requirements by the University.. Others include HND certificates (minimum upper credit) in the Public Health Inspector’s Diploma of the Royal Society of Health Dip RSH) or West Africa Health Examination Board (WAHEB) Diploma for Public Health Superintendents/Health Technologists, National Diploma (ND) (Upper Credit) in Environmental Health Sciences, or Community Health.
utme_requirements: This shall be for a period of 5 years. Requirements include 5 O level credits in five subjects including English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology taken and passed at not more than two sittings
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology

title: ENVIRONMENTAL HEALTH SCIENCE

title: ENVIRONMENTAL MANAGEMENT & TOXICOLOGY

subjects: English Language, Mathematics,  Biology, Chemistry, Agricultural Science or Physics

title: PROSTHETICS/ORTHOTICS TECHNOLOGY
de_requirements:
Have passed WAEC or NECO with minimum of 5 credits including English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics in one sitting, prospective candidates must have acquired any one of the following:

i. A minimum of grade C pass at Higher School Certificate advanced level or its equivalent in Biology, Chemistry and Physics in not more than one sitting.

ii. A minimum of second class degree in any of the basic sciences or basic medical sciences from University of Medical Sciences or any recognized University.

iii. Be a holder of a diploma (upper credit) from Medical Rehabilitation Therapists Board accredited programmes.
utme_requirements: Credits in Chemistry, Physics, Biology, English Language and Mathematics in the West African School Certificate Examination (WASCE) or National Examination Council (NECO) provided that all subjects are taken and passed in one sitting.
subjects: English Language, Physics, Chemistry, Biology.

title: PROSTHETICS/ORTHOTICS TECHNOLOGY
de_requirements:
Have passed WAEC or NECO with minimum of 5 credits including English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics in one sitting, prospective candidates must have acquired any one of the following:

i. A minimum of grade C pass at Higher School Certificate advanced level or its equivalent in Biology, Chemistry and Physics in not more than one sitting.

ii. A minimum of second class degree in any of the basic sciences or basic medical sciences from University of Medical Sciences or any recognized University.

iii. Be a holder of a diploma (upper credit) from Medical Rehabilitation Therapists Board accredited programmes.
utme_requirements: Credits in Chemistry, Physics, Biology, English Language and Mathematics in the West African School Certificate Examination (WASCE) or National Examination Council (NECO) provided that all subjects are taken and passed in one sitting.
subjects: English Language, Physics, Chemistry, Biology.
